page.title: 14Beckingham(Lincs) _ Clubs 2
page.content: { "Ladies' Swing into Shape" { _________________________ On Tuesday evenings most weeks of the year you will see a number of ladies converge on the village hall for a session of "Swing into Shape". We are ladies of varying ages from 16yrs. to 56yrs., but the majority of us come into the category of mums with growing or grown up families. We are trying to put some shape back into our bodies, with some degree of success. An experienced teacher guides us through the two hour session of carefully planned exercises to music to try and work our bodies back into shape. Once a year classes from all over the county meet for a huge 'Swing into Shape' session. Our dress consists of leotards and tights, the basic design being for ease of movement.
